The inquisitor demanded that we hand over the artefact, but we refused. Our only option now is to defeat him and his guards. The inquisitor called the artefact the 'Astral Prism'. We communicated with the lich queen Vlaakith, who told us there is someone inside the artefact - and that we should kill them. We can combine the artefact with the planecaster to enter it.
